bonkers12 - after un raring the file go to install click on the COTTA-COD4 file ( a hat) and it will start to install given the launage is mexcian, it will then ask you where to install, you need to install it in the COD 4 MW folder it should look like this.

C:\!CALL OF DUTY 4 MW!\!CALL OF DUTY 4 MW!\!CALL OF DUTY 4 MW!\COD 4 MW

(If C is your main hard drive you want game on )

When you open this folder up you will see a little spanner click on this to install game. 

Hope this helps

PS: install the directory in the folder "COD 4 MW"
and run "setup.bat our install.bat" and wait +/- 30 minuts.
Let the installation run, it may seem stuck on 1% but not this: P
Do not cancel. If you cancel again do it again.
